nhc_headline: ...HELENE PRODUCING DAMAGING GUSTY WINDS AND LIFE-THREATENING  FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF THE SOUTHEAST AND SOUTHERN APPALACHIANS... ...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY IN EFFECT FOR METROPOLITAN ATLANTA...
summary:
...HELENE PRODUCING DAMAGING GUSTY WINDS AND LIFE-THREATENING  FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF THE SOUTHEAST AND SOUTHERN APPALACHIANS... ...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY IN EFFECT FOR METROPOLITAN ATLANTA...
 As of 8:00 AM EDT Fri Sep 27
 the center of Helene was located near 34.2, -83.0
 with movement N at 30 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 972 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
